title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1500.1 - Availability of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1500.1 - Availability of records

State Regulations

Records will be available at 110 Watervliet Avenue, Albany, New York 12206, on Thursdays which are normal working days between the hours of
9:30 a.m. and 12 noon at a public information space adjacent to the main
entrance, identified by a sign, for accepting requests for information and
services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1500.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
